name: Meadow [GGJ2023]
description:
Meadow is an AR game for Meta Quest that let's you plant a lush meadow in your living room. Figure out how to combine plants to attract a diverse flora and fauna to your plot of nature.

Created in 48h during Global Game Jam 2023.
Requires a Meta Quest 2 or Meta Quest Pro to play.

Team:
Guillaume Pauli (https://guillaumepoly.itch.io/)
Thomas Van Bouwel
